comments.body: Why using `.forever` here ? It needlessly floods the queue with `Left(Take.End)` items when the right stream is not terminated.

Previously, we didn't have a means to express Queue shutdown. We will change all these to do:

`queue.offer(endToken) *> queue.shutdown`

That way, you get 1 chance to see the queue is ended. If you call queue methods after that, you'll be terminated.
